database.name: Oracle
database.select: select TABLE_NAME = t.name, DESCRIPTION = CAST(ISNULL(ep.value, '') AS nvarchar(100)) from sys.tables t left join sys.extended_properties ep on t.object_id=ep.major_id AND ep.minor_id=0 ORDER BY t.name

SELECT COLUMN_NAME = c.name, TABLE_NAME = OBJECT_NAME(c.object_id), DATA_TYPE = t.name, DATA_LENGTH = COLUMNPROPERTY(c.object_id, c.name, 'PRECISION'), DATA_SCALE = isnull(COLUMNPROPERTY(c.object_id, c.name, 'SCALE'), 0), NULLABLE = case when c.is_nullable=1 then 'Y' else 'N' end, DEFAULT_VALUE = d.text, DESCRIPTION = cast(ep.value as nvarchar(100)) FROM sys.columns c left join sys.types t on c.user_type_id=t.user_type_id left join sys.syscomments d on c.default_object_id=d.id left join sys.extended_properties ep on c.object_id=ep.major_id and c.column_id=ep.minor_id where c.object_id=OBJECT_ID(?)

SELECT i.name AS CONSTRAINT_NAME ,OBJECT_NAME(ic.object_id) AS TABLE_NAME ,COL_NAME(ic.object_id,ic.column_id) AS COLUMN_NAME FROM sys.indexes AS i INNER JOIN sys.index_columns AS ic ON i.object_id = ic.object_id AND i.index_id = ic.index_id WHERE i.is_primary_key = 1 AND i.object_id = OBJECT_ID(?) ORDER BY i.name

SELECT f.name AS FK_NAME ,OBJECT_NAME (f.referenced_object_id) AS PK_TABLE_NAME ,COL_NAME(fc.referenced_object_id, fc.referenced_column_id) AS PK_COLUMN_NAME ,OBJECT_NAME(f.parent_object_id) AS FK_TABLE_NAME ,COL_NAME(fc.parent_object_id, fc.parent_column_id) AS FK_COLUMN_NAME FROM sys.foreign_keys AS f INNER JOIN sys.foreign_key_columns AS fc ON f.object_id = fc.constraint_object_id WHERE f.parent_object_id = OBJECT_ID(?) ORDER BY f.name

SELECT INDEX_NAME = i.name, TABLE_NAME = OBJECT_NAME(ic.object_id), COLUMN_NAME = COL_NAME(ic.object_id, ic.column_id), IS_UNIQUE = case when i.is_unique=1 then 'true' else 'false' end FROM sys.indexes i, sys.index_columns ic WHERE i.object_id = ic.object_id AND i.index_id=ic.index_id AND i.object_id = OBJECT_ID(?)

SELECT t.name TRIGGER_NAME, e.type TRIGGER_TYPE, e.type_desc TRIGGER_TYPE_DESC, c.text TRIGGER_BODY FROM sys.triggers t INNER JOIN sys.trigger_events e on t.object_id=e.object_id INNER JOIN sys.syscomments c on t.object_id=c.id AND t.parent_id = OBJECT_ID(?) ORDER BY t.name
